worldSaver.options.worldSaver.enableWorl: Determines if World Saver will save worlds to Google Drive.
worldSaver.options.worldSaver.enableAuto: Determines if World Saver will automatically save worlds to Google Drive. How often this happens is dependent on the value of Autosave Interval setting.
worldSaver.options.worldSaver.autosaveIn: Determines how often World Saver will autosave worlds to Google Drive. This cannot be changed while in a world.
